read_converted_text_file.name: read_converted_text_file
read_converted_text_file.description: Read the content of '/Users/dylan/Desktop/1Res/osc/ComputerAgentWithVisionDev/working_dir/downloaded.txt' to extract its text for analysis.

extract_forest_area_data.name: extract_forest_area_data
extract_forest_area_data.description: Analyze the text content from 'read_converted_text_file' to find the forest area in millions of hectares for Brazil and Canada in the year 2020.

calculate_difference.name: calculate_difference
calculate_difference.description: Calculate the difference in forest area between Brazil and Canada in 2020 based on the data extracted by 'extract_forest_area_data'.

format_result.name: format_result
format_result.description: Format the calculated difference into a readable answer to the question of how many more millions of hectares of forest are in Brazil than in Canada in 2020.
